tool_description: Retrieves detailed history of a customer's loyalty point earnings, spending, and balance changes over a specified time period.

start_date.description: Start of date range for history

end_date.description: End of date range for history

transaction_type.description: Filter by transaction type (earned, redeemed, expired, adjusted)

include_details.description: Whether to include detailed breakdown information

error_messages: Customer not found: Customer ID does not exist in the system.
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates.
Invalid transaction type: Must be one of earned, redeemed, expired, adjusted, or all.
Date range too large: Maximum date range is 2 years.
History unavailable: Cannot access customer point history due to system error.
usage: Provide customer_id and date range to retrieve point history. Filter by transaction_type if needed, and set include_details to false for summary only.

total_transactions.description: Number of point transactions in the period

total_points_earned.description: Total points earned in the period

total_points_redeemed.description: Total points redeemed in the period

transaction_dates.description: List of transaction timestamps in the period

transaction_amounts.description: List of point amounts for each transaction
